Texts.Eng: A standard military bed. You could bounce a coin off those sheets!
Texts.Chs: 一张标准的军用床。你可以把一枚硬币从床单上弹下来！

Texts.Eng: Mm. This bed brings me back to my days at the Protectorate... and the resistance.
Texts.Chs: 嗯。这张床让我回想起我在大地守护团的日子。。。还有抵抗。

Texts.Eng: This bed clearly belongs to an exceptionally disciplined individual.
Texts.Chs: 这张床显然属于一个非常守纪律的人。

Texts.Eng: This bed has sacrificed basic aesthetics and comfort for functionality.
Texts.Chs: 这张床牺牲了基本的美感和舒适度，取而代之的是功能性。

Texts.Eng: This bed was clearly meant for sturdiness, not comfort.
Texts.Chs: 这张床显然是为了坚固，而不是舒适。

Texts.Eng: Wow, this bed's well made. Guess someone doesn't want an earful from their drill sergeant.
Texts.Chs: 哇，这张床做得很好。我猜有人不想让他们的训练中士大发雷霆。
